info.name: Soulzaa Backend API
info.description: Complete Soulzaa backend API collection with all endpoints

request.description: Register a new user with Firebase ID token
Sign in user with Firebase ID token
Get all pending chat requests for the user
Create a new chat or get existing 1-on-1 chat
Get all active chats with pagination
Get paginated messages for a specific chat
Search messages in a specific chat
Get chat history for a specific user
Get detailed information about a chat
Block a user in a chat
Delete a chat and all its messages
Get authentication token for client-side media upload
Upload multiple media files at once (max 10)
Get metadata information about an uploaded file
Delete a media file from ImageKit
Get list of all user profiles
